contents:
我直接從Google翻譯過來的，美帝真好用，責任統統甩一甩丟給美國去了


Since the outbreak of COVID-19 was first identified in Wuhan in mid-December 2019, the first
infected individuals identified in other provinces and regions of China, and other countries, during
January 2020, have been assumed to have been infected in Wuhan or through contact with people
from Wuhan.

For example, the first identified infected patient and his four family members
from Shenzhen visited Wuhan between Dec 29, 2019 and Jan 4, 2020,and the first identified
infected patient in the United States visited family in Wuhan and returned to Washington State on
January 15, 2020.

大部分粉红倒不会用这个来攻击，因为第一例发病按照卫计委的说法都是在2019年12月8日，而这篇论文说12月初或者11月底就在人传人了。而这里面提到的深圳家庭去武汉都是12月29日了，都快过了一个月。而美国第一例患者的话是拜访武汉的家庭和回美国在2020年1月15日，都是2020年1月了，都快过了一个月。

粉红现在认为是军运会有人把这个病毒传到武汉的。

http://finance.eastmoney.com/a/202002221393254560.html
http://eprint.las.ac. cn/abs/202002.00033

@筱田君
